mapper.insert: insert into mlg_board (title, ctnt, user_no) values (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{user_no})
mapper.select: select board_no,title,ctnt,left(regdt,10) AS regdt,user_no, (SELECT Max(board_no) FROM mlg_board WHERE #{board_no}> board_no) AS prv, (SELECT Min(board_no) FROM mlg_board WHERE board_no > #{board_no}) AS nxt from mlg_board where board_no = #{board_no}
